Address.label: Address
Address.value: 500 WEST TEXAS,SUITE 1200, MIDLAND, Texas, 79701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Viper Energy Partners was formed by Diamondback Energy in 2014 to own mineral royalty interests in the Permian Basin. At the end of 2020, Viper owns 24,350 net royalty acres that produced 26,551 boe/d. Proved reserves are mostly oil, and at the end of 2020 stand at 99,392 mboe.
